ginplugin.name: sf-xml-plugin
ginplugin.description: A simple content provider for content in xml files. Node tag-names and values are attribute names and values.

params.param: The file path of the xml data source.
The xml tag name for the content url.
The xml node tag name for the content's modification date.
Definition of tag names for key attributes.
The node tag names for date attributes.
The node tag names for number attributes.
The date format for a simple date formatte described as a string pattern.
The tag name for a fulltext part of the content item.
The content type of the content objects of the xml file.
